alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:56PM CDT until April 05 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE AND NORTH CENTRAL LAVACA COUNTIES... At 1055 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schulenburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Schulenburg, Swiss Alp, Dubina, Moravia, Ammannsville, High Hill, Mullins Prairie, Holman and Ellinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
